KiDS-GGL References¶

This is a list of papers that have used parts or all of kids_ggl in their analysis, in chronological order.

KiDS papers¶

  • Brouwer et al. (2018)
  • Dvornik et al. (2018)
  • Brouwer et al. (2017)
  • Dvornik et al. (2017)
  • Hildebrandt et al. (2017)
  • Brouwer et al. (2016)
  • van Uitert et al. (2016)
  • Sifon et al. (2015)
  • Viola et al. (2015)

Other papers¶

  • Sifon et al. (2018a)
  • Sifon et al. (2018b)
